bibles.title: The Holy Bible in Catalan
bibles.title_vernacular: La Bíblia: versió dels textos originals i notes pels Monjos de Montserrat

language.name: Catalan
language.area: Northeast, around Barcelona; Catalonia, Valencia provinces, Balearic Islands; Carche region, Murcia Province. Menorquin is Menorca. Pallarese, in Pallars. Ribagorçan from Aran Valley to south of Tamarit, and from Noguera Ribagorçana to border with Aragonese. Also in Algeria, Andorra, Argentina, Belgium, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Cuba, Dominican Republic, France, Germany, Italy, Mexico, Switzerland, United States, Uruguay, Venezuela.

bibles.title: The Holy Scriptures
bibles.title_vernacular: La Santa bíblia o les Santes Escriptures

language.name: Catalan
language.area: Northeast, around Barcelona; Catalonia, Valencia provinces, Balearic Islands; Carche region, Murcia Province. Menorquin is Menorca. Pallarese, in Pallars. Ribagorçan from Aran Valley to south of Tamarit, and from Noguera Ribagorçana to border with Aragonese. Also in Algeria, Andorra, Argentina, Belgium, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Cuba, Dominican Republic, France, Germany, Italy, Mexico, Switzerland, United States, Uruguay, Venezuela.

bibles.title: World Messianic Bible
bibles.description: The World Messianic Bible is a Public Domain translation of the Holy Bible into modern English as spoken among Messianic Jews. It has also been called the World English Bible: Messianic Edition and the Hebrew Names Version.

language.name: Lisu
language.area: West Yunnan Province, 11 prefectures, 63 counties, upper reaches of Salween and Mekong rivers; Sichuan Province, southwest Liangshan Prefecture. Also in India, Myanmar, Thailand.

bibles.title: Arabic North Levantine - Genesis Portion
bibles.title_vernacular: شمال بلاد الشام العربية - سفر التكوين
bibles.description: Bible Portions in Lebanese translated by the Trinitarian Bible Society in 1981 (?). Lebanese is largely spoken in Palestine. Morris Sigel Seale (14 July 1896 – 29 August 1993) was a Jewish born scholar and theologian who wrote about Jewish, Christian and Muslim traditions and explored extensively the links between the religions. He wrote three influential books and contributed numerous articles to Theological journals including the Journal of Biblical Literature and The Muslim World. He studied theology at Queen's University of Belfast and served on an Irish Presbyterian mission in Damascus, having converted from Judaism.

language.name: North Levantine Arabic
language.area: Also in Antigua and Barbuda, Argentina, Belize, Cyprus, Dominican Republic, Egypt, French Guiana, Israel, Jamaica, Lebanon, Mali, Puerto Rico, Suriname, Trinidad and Tobago, Turkey (Asia).

language.name: Kashmiri
language.area: Jammu and Kashmir; Punjab; Uttar Pradesh; Delhi; Kashmir Valley. Also in Pakistan, United Kingdom, United States.

language.name: Maltese
language.area: Also in Australia, Canada, Italy, Libya, Tunisia, United Kingdom, United States.
